title: Up to 0.02% BAC
description: People who are very sensitive to alcohol or not used to drinking may already experience disinhibiting effects. Talkativeness also increases.

title: From 0.02% BAC
description: Slowed reactions, reduced coordination of movements, less receptive to criticism, increased risk-taking behavior, loss of social distance.

title: From 0.03% BAC
description: First restrictions in field of vision, problems with distance estimation.

title: From 0.05% BAC
description:
Mild intoxication,
Significant decrease in reaction ability,
especially to red signals (red light weakness),
reduced concentration ability,
impaired hearing,
increased irritability.

title: From 0.08% BAC
description: First balance disorders, narrowed field of vision (tunnel vision), restricted reaction ability, significant disinhibition, euphoria, slurred speech & talkativeness, walking disorders.

title: From 0.10% BAC
description: Significant speech disorders, risk-taking behavior and aggressiveness continue to increase.

title: From 0.15% BAC
description:
Severe intoxication,
Loss of reality perception,
mood swings,
severe coordination disorders,
balance disorders,
orientation disorders,
slurred speech.

title: From 0.25% BAC
description: Clouding of consciousness, paralysis symptoms, double vision, loss of memory function.

title: From 0.30% BAC
description: Strong sedation, unconsciousness up to coma.

title: From 0.35% BAC
description: Risk of respiratory center paralysis and thus danger to life.
